books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Mark Greaney
books.description: President Jack Ryan and his son, a covert intelligence expert, try to counter a Russian threat in Clancy’s last novel before his death.
books.name: COMMAND AUTHORITY

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum pursues a mobster on the lam.
books.name: TAKEDOWN TWENTY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Mickey Haller, a.k.a. the Lincoln lawyer, defends a “digital pimp” accused of murder.
books.name: THE GODS OF GUILT

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A small Michigan town is transformed when its residents receive phone calls said to be from heaven.
books.name: THE FIRST PHONE CALL FROM HEAVEN

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Sean King and Michelle Maxwell, former Secret Service agents turned private investigators, scrutinize the report of a soldier’s mysterious death in Afghanistan.
books.name: KING AND MAXWELL

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: A grotesque man living in exile beneath the city encounters a teenage girl hiding from dangerous enemies.
books.name: INNOCENCE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In the first book of the Cousins O'Dwyer trilogy, Iona Sheehan moves to Ireland to investigate her family's history.
books.name: DARK WITCH
